name: calculators
description: Handy calculator tools in an easily-accessible web page

scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js --debug src/app/main.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/calculators.js
scripts.build:test: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/test/**/*.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > test/test.js
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/app/main.js -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/calculators.js
scripts.watch: node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js src/app/main.js --debug -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/calculators.js
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:test
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && npm run build:minify && script/create-dist.sh
